DOC.brief_summary: This 2 arm study will compare the efficacy and safety of intermittent oral Xeloda plus Eloxatin (oxaliplatin) with that of fluorouracil/leucovorin in patients who have had surgery for colon cancer and no previous chemotherapy. Patients will be randomized to receive either 1) XELOX (Xeloda 1000mg/m2 po bid on days 1-15 + oxaliplatin) in 3 week cycles or 2)5-fluorouracil + leucovorin in 4 or 8 week cycles. The anticipated time on study treatment is until disease progression and the target sample size is 500+ individuals.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Xeloda (Capecitabine) Plus Oxaliplatin in Patients With Colon Cancer
DOC.criteria: adult patients >=18 years of age; colon cancer; complete tumor resection. prior treatment with cytotoxic chemotherapy, radiotherapy, or immunotherapy for the currently treated colon cancer.
